com.se.simplicity.picking
Interface Picker

public interface Picker

Picks SceneGraphs. The SceneGraph is picked based on a Camera and a Pick that generally represents a subset of the Camera's frame.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Summary
 PickEvent pickSceneGraph(SceneGraph sceneGraph, Camera camera, Pick pick)
           Picks a SceneGraph using the given Pick and basing the Pick on the given Camera.
 

Method Detail

pickSceneGraph

PickEvent pickSceneGraph(SceneGraph sceneGraph,
                         Camera camera,
                         Pick pick)

Picks a SceneGraph using the given Pick and basing the Pick on the given Camera.

Parameters:
sceneGraph - The SceneGraph to pick.
camera - The Camera to base the pick on.
pick - The Pick to apply to the SceneGraph.
Returns:
An event containing any picked compoonents of the SceneGraph.
